{{also|貪官污吏|贪官污吏}}
==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|たん|かん|お|り}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=たんかんおり|貪官|tr1=tankan|t1=greedy official|汚吏|tr2=ori|t2=corrupt official}}.

May be read as ''donkan ori'' instead, using the [[慣用読み#Japanese|kan'yōyomi]] of ''don'' for the first character.  However, the straight [[漢音#Japanese|kan'on]] reading of ''tankan ori'' is the most common.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|たんかん おり}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|たんかん おり|どんかん おり}}

# [[corrupt]] [[official]]
